description: I am a first generation college student who loves to socialize and laugh. I spent a year at UGA before coming to my senses and transferring to this institute where I have enjoyed the culture and opportunities available to develop myself for a successful and fulfilling career.
aspects: A diverse brotherhood that is foundational for creating a capable and worthwhile network. This is a place where you can have a great time, make a positive profound impact, and develop your personal brand all while chasing your goals and dreams. Not to mention, we know how to have fun and live life to the fullest.
involve: Georgia Tech College of Computing Information Technology
McKenney's Automation and Controls Solutions Co-op
Siemens Engineering Leadership Development Program Intern
GE Healthcare Operations Management Leadership Program Intern
quotes: "A ship is safe in harbor, but that is not what ships are for."
"Find something you love doing so much that you will gladly do it for free. Then learn to do it so well that you people will happily pay you for it."
"Efficiency is the foundation for survival. Effectiveness is the foundation for success."
name: Robert Roland Joseph Alix jr (AJ)
